Fields.Expire-Help: Set the duration, in seconds, before this emergency message expires and stops retrying delivery.
Fields.Message-Help: The message to send to the Pushover server
Fields.Priority-Help: The priority of the message being sent
Fields.Retry-Help: Specify the interval, in seconds, between retry attempts for this emergency message in case of delivery failure.

Pushover.Description: A plugin that allows you to send messages to a Pushover server.
Pushover.Label: Pushover

Fields.ApiToken-Help: The application API token use for sending notifications.
Fields.UserKey-Help: Your personal user key for receiving notifications.
